name: Banaue-Sagada Adventure Tour Package
description:
Experience the best Nature Adventure tour package the Philippines has to
 offer. This tour package includes a visit to the amazing Banaue Rice 
Terraces, sunrise watching at Kiltepan peak, spelunking inside Sumaging 
or Lumiang Cave, watching the locals weave their magic while creating 
works of arts and a taste of some of the sweetest strawberries from La 
Trinidad Benguet.
